Definition at line 97 of file zrovector-misc.hpp.

References _zrovector::array, zrovector::array, _zrovector::l, and zrovector::l.

{VERBOSE_REPORT;
  _zrovector newvec;
  
  //////// shallow copy ////////
  newvec.l =vec.l;
  newvec.array =vec.array;
  
  //////// nullify ////////
  vec.l =0;
  vec.array =NULL;
  
  return newvec;
}
